title: Which one should I buy, Redmi note 9 pro or Redmi note 9? - Quora

response.answer_text: Redmi Note 9 pro is better than Redmi note 9 on every aspect expect charging speed. But if your budget is 12K then Redmi note 9 is a very good option. As for Note 9 pro there is a better phone at the same price. Which is Poco M2 pro. Poco M2 pro has everything which Redmi Note 9 pro has with better charging speed and a bit better UI. so there is no point of buying Redmi Note 9 pro.

Redmi note 9 pro is better in some points than redmi note 9. Note 9 pro comes with snapdragon 720G chipset where as note 9 comes mediatek G85. Redmi note 9 pro comes with UFS 2.1. In camera also note 9 pro has 64 MP camera and micro camera of 5 MP with video recording upto 4K@30fps. Redmi note 9 pro is about 1000 Rs. Expensive than Redmi note 9, but they are providing better specification in redmi note 9 pro than Redmi note 9.
